data.title: Welcome To Eyre Square Hotel™
data.meta_description: Always book directly on our website to get the best rate! You’ll save €€€. Plan your staycation and catch up on all of those missed moments!
data.text:
Our Rooms

All of our bedrooms are smoke-free, have free Wifi, luxury bedding with crisp white sheets, duvets and soft fluffy white towels, multi-channel plasma TV and tea and coffee making facilities.

Explore

Treat yourself to a delightful escape in the heart of Galway City. Choose between our two packages...

READ MORE

Eat & Drink

A warm and friendly welcome awaits you at Merchant and whether you want to wind down after a great day sightseeing in Galway or are about to sample the vibrant nightlife that Galway offers our team at Merchant will ensure you have an enjoyable experience with us.
